name: Indyeva Voolama III Top - Women's
description:
Made using a blend of recycled water bottles, fibre sourced from sustainable forests and a hint of spandex, the Voolama knows that sustainability is always in style.Dropped hemline offers a little extra coverage and plays well with a French tuck.Made using recycled PET bottles, 14 bottles went into this top.Repreve® recycled polyester, lyocell and spandex knit has a comfortable stretch and dries quickly.drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture.UPF 30+ UV protection.Length is 65cm in front, 66cm in back.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}
